title: AE脚本：图层层级管理脚本 Aescripts Squirrel V1.0 + 使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: 脚本可以将图层以层级的方式管理，这可以更容易找到需要的图层，修改和操作更加便捷。Squirrel the Layer Tree Browser is a hierarchy editor for After Effects. If you’re dealing with complicated rigs made of pickwhip spaghetti, Squirrel is here to help out. Squirrel is an interactive treeview editor much like an object manager or outliner from a 3D platform. Squirrel instantly converts your current comp into a treeview based on parenting requiring no setup! A great organizational tool, Squirrel makes your rigs easy to understand and your layers easy to find!
